00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Xml;
00024 using System.Net;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Collections;
00027 using System.Net.Sockets;
00028 
00029 using Niry;
00030 using Niry.Utils;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00034     public class XmlRequest {
00035         protected XmlTextReader xmlReader = null;
00036         protected Hashtable xmlAttributes = null;
00037         protected StringBuilder xmlText = null;
00038         protected Stack xmlStack = null;
00039         protected string tag = null;
00040 
00042         public XmlRequest () {
00043             this.tag = null;
00044             this.xmlText = new StringBuilder();
00045             this.xmlAttributes = new Hashtable();
00046         }
00047 
00049         public XmlRequest (string xml) {
00050             StringReader stringReader = new StringReader(xml);
00051             this.xmlReader = new XmlTextReader(stringReader);
00052         }
00053 
00055         public XmlRequest (Stream stream) {
00056             this.xmlReader = new XmlTextReader(stream);
00057         }
00058 
00059         // =======================================
00060         // PUBLIC Methods
00061         // =======================================
00062 
00064         public void AddAttributeMd5Sum () {
00065             string md5sum = CryptoUtils.MD5String(this.GenerateXml());
00066             if (this.xmlAttributes.ContainsKey("md5sum")) {
00067                 // Already Exist, Replace md5sum value
00068                 this.xmlAttributes["md5sum"] = md5sum;
00069             } else {
00070                 this.xmlAttributes.Add("md5sum", md5sum);
00071             }
00072         }
00073 
00075         public bool CheckMd5Sum() {
00076             string md5sum = (string) this.xmlAttributes["md5sum"];
00077             if (md5sum == null) return(false);          
00078 
00079             // Remove Md5Sum from Attributes
00080             this.xmlAttributes.Remove("md5sum");
00081             // Regenerate XmlRequest md5sum
00082             string md5sumCheck = CryptoUtils.MD5String(this.GenerateXml());
00083 
00084             bool check = md5sumCheck.Equals(md5sum);
00085             this.xmlAttributes.Add("md5sum", md5sum);
00086             return(check);
00087         }
00088 
00090         public string GenerateXml() {
00091             string xml;
00092 
00093             StringWriter strStream = new StringWriter();
00094             XmlTextWriter xmlWriter = new XmlTextWriter(strStream);
00095             
00096             // Start Tag <tag>
00097             xmlWriter.WriteStartElement(null, this.tag, null);
00098             
00099             // Attributes
00100             foreach (string key in this.xmlAttributes.Keys) {
00101                 xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute(null, key, null);
00102                 xmlWriter.WriteString(this.xmlAttributes[key].ToString());
00103                 xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00104             }
00105 
00106             // Message Body
00107             string text = xmlText.ToString();
00108             if (text != "") {
00109                 string bodyB64 = TextUtils.Base64Encode(text);
00110                 xmlWriter.WriteString(bodyB64);
00111             }
00112 
00113             // End Tag </tag>
00114             xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();
00115             
00116             // XML -> String
00117             xml = strStream.ToString();
00118 
00119             // Close Xml Stream
00120             xmlWriter.Close();
00121             
00122             return(xml);
00123         }
00124     
00126         // <tag attr...>ASFJHASJKFHASJGKHSAJGHASJGH</tag>
00127         public bool Parse () {
00128             this.xmlStack = new Stack();
00129             this.xmlText = new StringBuilder();
00130             this.xmlAttributes = new Hashtable();
00131     
00132             while (this.xmlReader.Read()) {
00133                 switch (this.xmlReader.NodeType) {
00134                     case XmlNodeType.Element: {
00135                         this.xmlStack.Push(this.xmlReader.Name);
00136             
00137                         if (this.xmlReader.HasAttributes) {
00138                             for (int i=0; i < xmlReader.AttributeCount; i++) {
00139                                 this.xmlReader.MoveToAttribute(i);
00140                                 this.xmlAttributes.Add (this.xmlReader.Name, 
00141                                                         this.xmlReader.Value);
00142                             }
00143                         }
00144                         break;
00145                     } case XmlNodeType.Text: {
00146                         this.xmlText.Append(this.xmlReader.Value);
00147                         break;
00148                     } case XmlNodeType.EndElement: {
00149                         if (OnXmlEndElement() == false) return(false);
00150                         break;
00151                     } default: {
00152                         return(false);
00153                     }
00154                 }
00155             }
00156             return(true);
00157         }
00158     
00160         public static bool IsEndedXml (string cmd) {
00161             try {
00162                 int substrLength;
00163                 int posStartTag;            
00164 
00165                 if (cmd[0] == '<' && 
00166                     cmd[cmd.Length - 2] == '/' && 
00167                     cmd[cmd.Length - 1] == '>')
00168                 {
00169                     return(true);
00170                 }
00171 
00172                 posStartTag = cmd.IndexOf('<') + 1;
00173                 substrLength = cmd.IndexOf('>') - posStartTag;
00174                 string tag = cmd.Substring(posStartTag, substrLength);
00175             
00176                 posStartTag = cmd.LastIndexOf('<') + 1;
00177                 substrLength = cmd.LastIndexOf('>') - posStartTag;
00178                 string endTag = cmd.Substring(posStartTag, substrLength);
00179 
00180                 return((('/' + tag).StartsWith(endTag)));
00181             } catch {}
00182             
00183             return(false);
00184         }
00185 
00186         // PRIVATE Methods
00187         private bool OnXmlEndElement () {
00188             if (this.xmlReader.Name.Equals(this.xmlStack.Peek()))
00189                 return(false);
00190             return(true);
00191         }
00192     
00193         // PUBLIC Properties
00195         public string FirstTag {
00196             get { return((tag == null) ? (string) this.xmlStack.Peek() : tag); }
00197             set { this.tag = value; }
00198         }
00199 
00201         public Hashtable Attributes {
00202             get { return(this.xmlAttributes); }
00203         }
00204         
00206         public string BodyBase64 {
00207             get { return(this.xmlText.ToString()); }
00208         }
00209     
00211         // BASE64 -> Text   
00212         public string BodyText {
00213             get { return(TextUtils.Base64Decode(this.BodyBase64)); }
00214             set { this.xmlText.Append(value); }
00215         }
00216     }
00217 }
